Activity Diagram Start.description: Adds the starting/initial step from which all paths start from in the activity diagram

Activity Diagram Stop.description: Adds the termination step from which all (or a) path(s) should lead in the activity diagram

Activity Diagram Activity.description:
Adds an activity that follows on from the previous control statement.
 Note, to use SDL sterotyped activities replace the terminating ';' with one of the following characters: |,<,>,/,],}

Activity Diagram Split.description: Adds an "split, split again, end split" to the activity diagram.

Activity Diagram If Condition.description: Adds an if-then-elseif-else condition to the activity diagram. Add/remove the elseif/else blocks as required

Activity Diagram If-elseif Condition.description: Adds an if-then-elseif-else condition to the activity diagram. Add/remove the elseif/else blocks as required

Activity Diagram Repeat.description: Adds a repeat while loop to the activity diagram

Activity Diagram While.description: Adds a while loop to the activity diagram

Activity Diagram Fork.description: Adds a fork segment to represent parallel processing within the activity diagram

Activity Diagram Activity Note.description: Appends a text note directly left|right of the preceding activity

Activity Diagram Activity Multi-Line Not.description: Appends a text note directly left|right of the preceding activity

Activity Diagram Partition.description: Add a group that encloses a set of related activities within the activity diagram

Activity Diagram Swimlane.description: Creates a new vertical lane for all subsequent activities to be enclosed in. Use the color names guide to identify colors or use #hexCodes

Activity Diagram Detach.description: Causes an abrupt end immediately following the preceding activity
